highlights: Collaborated with a team to develop and maintain custom Wordpress solutions for clients across campus
Oversaw department-wide site overhaul for the Office of Research and Economic Development
Improved accssibility compliance for University websites as part of a campus-wide initiative
Worked on internal applications to improve project workflows including a media asset tool written in Laravel and a tool to manage branding assets written in Ruby on Rails and EmberJS
Developed complex applications that implemented Backbone.js using Ruby on Rails as a consumable API
Worked with designers to create clean and intuitive interfaces for client websites
Created e-commerce sites taht utilized oAuth and Amazon Web Service to process payments and host product data
Created fully responsive websites using a mobile-first approach
Ensured cross-browser compatability for all division websites
Developed an admin system that was used for dat a reporting by department heads

projects.name: Keyboard
projects.description: A project I started to familiarize myself with the finer points of React, the Web Audio API and an attempt at integrating music theory with an interactive Synthesizer

projects.name: Bassline
projects.description: I wrote this PostCSS plugin to make managing vertical rhythm on a website much simpler by abstracting the math needed for the font-size and line-height properties
